title: 4 Is Not Majority?
body: How in the world is 4 people wanting to ff at 15 minutes not a majority....can we stop being held captive by 1 person?

replies.body: ff15 should not even exist, requiring 5 people to agree is sensible.

It specifically says the FF@15 vote must be _unanimous_ to pass, that means **all 5** players are required to vote yes, not just the majority of players.

The FF@20 vote still requires the large majority.

>...can we stop being held captive by 1 person?

 Can everyone stop giving up as early as 5 to 15 minutes in? The FF@15 vote shouldn't even be a thing IMO.

im right around gold...theres some games you enter and from the get go a person intends to feed, states it says it and means it...they start feeding....you have to wait until 20 minutes to get out...because they are going to say no. but yall are right its too early and not a complete waste of time to have 4 people try and that 1 guy only there to int...and riot literally doesnt care about inting all the person has to do is not type and they can run it down freely

because an early ff is really stupid, unless you're at the very top tier of play, in which case people are sensible enough to know when an early ff is viable. I cant tell you how many times my team has made a comeback from an atrocious early game stomping.
